text.description:
This modern apartment offers over 540 sq ft of well-arranged accommodation. The hallway provides access to all rooms, including a contemporary three-piece bathroom. The open-plan kitchen flows into a bright living area with ample space for a dining setup. The flat also benefits from a new boiler installed only in August 2023.

Mill Court has recently undergone exterior renovations, including new windows in 2025, giving the block a refreshed and well-maintained appearance. The development is surrounded by attractive, secure communal gardens and also provides convenient bike storage for residents.

Ideally located, Southfields Tube Station is only 0.48 miles away, while Earlsfield Rail Station is just 0.5 miles, making this an excellent choice for commuters.
text.disclaimer: Disclaimer - Property reference STH250077. The information displayed about this property comprises a property advertisement. Rightmove.co.uk makes no warranty as to the accuracy or completeness of the advertisement or any linked or associated information, and Rightmove has no control over the content. This property advertisement does not constitute property particulars. The information is provided and maintained by Andrews Estate Agents, Southfields. Please contact the selling agent or developer directly to obtain any information which may be available under the terms of The Energy Performance of Buildings (Certificates and Inspections) (England and Wales) Regulations 2007 or the Home Report if in relation to a residential property in Scotland.

customerDescription.truncatedDescriptionHTML:
About Us

With roots dating back to 1946, Andrews has evolved into a prominent property specialist in Southern England. Boasting 44 sales and lettings branches, our growth is underpinned by a robust network of sales, lettings, and mortgage advisors based in Bath, Bristol, Gloucestershire, Kent, London, Oxfordshire and Surrey.

What sets us apart is our unique ownership structure. We're 100% owned by a charitable trust, so giving back and helping out communities in need is a h
customerDescription.descriptionHTML:
About Us

With roots dating back to 1946, Andrews has evolved into a prominent property specialist in Southern England. Boasting 44 sales and lettings branches, our growth is underpinned by a robust network of sales, lettings, and mortgage advisors based in Bath, Bristol, Gloucestershire, Kent, London, Oxfordshire and Surrey.

What sets us apart is our unique ownership structure. We're 100% owned by a charitable trust, so giving back and helping out communities in need is a huge part of Andrews. A large slice of our profits goes to causes that tackle big issues in our communities and overseas, like education, employment and shelter.

Since 1994 we've contributed over £10 million to fund social and innovative charitable enterprises. Stepping into our eighth decade in business it continues to be an integral part of our company identity and ideals.

industryAffiliations.name: Ombudsman for Estate Agents and Lettings Estate Agents

broadband.disclaimer: * This is the average speed from the provider with the fastest broadband package available on comparethemarket.com at this postcode. The average speed displayed is based on the download speeds of at least 50% of customers at peak time (8pm to 10pm). Fibre/cable services at the postcode are subject to availability and may differ between properties within a postcode. Speeds can be affected by a range of technical and environmental factors. The speed at the property may be lower than that listed above. You can check the estimated speed and confirm availability to a property prior to purchasing on the broadband provider's website. Providers may increase charges. The information is provided and maintained by Stickee Technology Limited.

propertyData.termsOfUse: This Application Programming Interface (API) is for the use of Rightmove Group Limited only. No other individual or business may link to, or make use of, this API without the express written permission of Rightmove's Legal Team. Any unauthorised use of this API will constitute a breach of Rightmove's Terms of Use, available at https://www.rightmove.co.uk/this-site/terms-of-use.html, and Rightmove will enforce its rights to the fullest extent permitted by law.

This cookie identifies a new user's very first session on a site where Hotjar is installed. It's used by Hotjar's recording filters to specifically identify and filter sessions from new users. Its duration is usually limited to the session.
This cookie persists the selection by the person using previews.
Used to manage an authenticated two factor authentication session.
Consent cookie for OneTrust CMP

definitions.description: Used to remember the properties you have already seen
Used to display personalised adverts based on your activity collected by Google
Used for analytics and reporting purposes such as counting your visits, sessions, campaign data and keep track of site usage within our professional users' site, Rightmove Plus.
Used to secure data inputted by our professional users against corruption
Used to store if you have viewed the app in the app store from the app ad banner
Enables us to know whether the data set in _hjUserAttributes Local Storage item is up to date or not.
Used to tracks unique visits for Comscore, an industry standard metrics company. Whist the duration is 1 year, some browsers may autoumatically delete this cookie sooner.
Helps identify where you came from before visiting the site (used in split URL A/B tests).
required for rmplus 2fa
Used to identify a Rightmove consumer.
Used to store the channel (residential lettings, commercial sales, etc) that you last searched in
This cookie is dropped by Vimeo who provide video content on the site
The cookie is used by Google to verify if a user's browser is configured to accept cookies. It's a simple test to see if cookies are enabled and doesn't store any personal information.
Holds current session data. Ensures subsequent requests in the session window are attributed to the same session.
Used in A/B tests across multiple websites to track your experience consistently.
Set upon successful login to our professional users' platform, Rightmove Plus, to store the branch the current user is on.
Used to communicate and propagate information about a feature flow for server verification.
Used for managing your session
Used for Two Factor Authentication to verify a visitors to our professional users' platform, Rightmove Plus
Used to keep visitors to our professional users' site, Rightmove Plus, on the same set of infrastructure
Used to store the current branch identifier & API key combination to allow switching between branches within our professional users' site, Rightmove Plus

Used for security purposes by Google AdSense, AdSense for Search, Display & Video 360, Google Ad Manager, Google Ads in order to authenticate users, prevent fraud, and protect users as they interact with a service.
Set when a user completes an on-site Survey. Ensures the same Survey does not reappear if it has already been filled in.
Associates the submitted MiP application with the user’s session and enable retrieval of the correct redirect URL with token when navigating to NBS
Used to keep you signed in across all of our platforms
Used to authenticate a user when opening a referencing application form via our professional users' site, Rightmove Plus
The cookie is used by Google to track session activity for ad formats. It's a session cookie, meaning it expires when the user's browsing session ends. This cookie is important for ad measurement.
Used to track your visits and chat sessions in Freshchat within our professional users' platform, Rightmove Plus

Google Analytics helps measure the website traffic and perform vital analytics tasks. For more information visit Google's Privacy Policy at: https://policies.google.com/privacy. To Opt-Out, visit: https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout/.
Remembers if you’ve given consent for VWO so we can respect your privacy choices and track A/B tests accurately once allowed.

This cookie is created to detect if the cookies are enabled on the visitor's browser or not. It also helps in tracking the number of browser sessions a visitor has gone through. The value of this cookie is always 1.
This cookie stores referral info allowing VWO to identify the original Traffic source in case of the Split URL campaign.

Publisher provided ID allows publishers to send Google Ad Manager an identifier for use in frequency capping, audience segmentation and audience targeting, sequential ad rotation, and other audience-based ad delivery controls across devices.
Used to determine how many times people who click on an advert go on to take an action
Set when a user interacts with a Link Survey invitation modal. Ensures the same invite does not reappear if it has already been shown.
Tracks how many times you’ve closed and reopened your browser during an A/B test.
Gives you a unique ID so we can group your activity for better A/B test reporting.
This cookie is created when a Test Campaign goal is triggered. This cookie, when created, will always have a value of 1
Checks if the Hotjar Tracking Code can use Session Storage.
Helps us count how many unique visitors come to the site.
This cookie stores session-level information.
Used to identify your browser and device across sessions
Used by Google to store ad personalization preferences and indicate if a user has opted out of personalized ads across Google services.
Used to store information about your search preferences to help us only show relevant promotions to you
Used by Comscore to track users across devices and websites.

Google Analytics User Identifier. This cookie collects information in an anonymous form. For more information visit Google's Privacy Policy at: https://policies.google.com/privacy. To Opt-Out, visit: https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout/.
Enables us to know when any User Attribute has changed and needs to be updated.
Wildcard to capture some VWO cookies.
Used to authenticate a user of our professional users' platform, Rightmove Plus
Keeps visitors to our professional users site, Rightmove Plus, on the same set of infrastructure
This cookie is set by our consent management platform (OneTrust) to store your privacy preferences in line with global data protection laws.
This cookie is used to determine whether a particular user's session should be included in the data sampling defined by the site's daily session limit in Hotjar.
Used to authenticate a user for our Referencing, Landlords and Tenancy Services (RLTS) within our professional users' site, Rightmove Plus
This cookie generates a unique id for every visitor and is used for the report segmentation feature in VWO, and it also allows you to view data in a more refined manner.
Used by OneTrust to store users cookie consent settings. Whist the duration is 1 year, some browsers may automatically delete this cookie sooner.

Used for managing your sessions to keep you securely logged in and to ensure that any selections you make are retained as you browse our platforms. This expires when the browsing session ends or you choose to log out
Used for managing your session
Checks if the Hotjar Tracking Code can use Local Storage.
Set when a user first lands on a page. Persists the Hotjar User ID which is unique to that site.
We try to store the _hjTLDTest cookie for different URL substring alternatives until it fails. Enables us to try to determine the most generic cookie path to use instead of page hostname.
Wildcard to capture some VWO cookies.
Set upon successful login to our professional users' platform, Rightmove Plus, to store the company the current user is on
Used for Two Factor Authentication to verify a visitor to our professional users' platform, Rightmove Plus
Set by Cloudflare via Arkose Labs to uniquely identify sessions for security purposes, enabling rate-limiting and bot protection. Required for site integrity and fraud prevention.
Ensures you’re not included in any A/B tests if you’ve opted out.
Remembers if you’ve opted out of VWO tracking across all websites.
Used to integrate with Braze.
This cookie stores persistent visitor-level data for VWO Insights.

Checks if your browser allows cookies and counts how many times you’ve visited.

Used to determine whether or not to keep a user logged in.

Used to run OneTrust experiments.
Consent banner and preference centre closed for OneTrust CMP

This cookie is a flag (set to true or false) that Hotjar uses to detect the first pageview of a user's session. It helps determine when a new session has started. It typically has a short duration, around 30 minutes.

Cookies used to ensure consistent A/B test experiences, track goal completion, remember exclusions due to traffic limits, confirm correct test versions after redirects, and temporarily store test settings until updates apply.
This cookie is generated when you switch variations in preview mode.
Used to stores if you have dismissed the app ad banner
Used as a security measure to help prevent visitors to our professional users' site, Rightmove Plus, using compromised passwords.
Stores whether you have chosen to close the profile banner so we know whether to show it again or not.
Used to store details of the property, the email of the recipient and any comments in the Marketing Report within our professional user's site, Rightmove Plus to improve page reload times.

Stores your recent searches so you can be displayed these.
Stores that you have closed the tooltip explaining how to switch between channels on saved properties so that we don't keep showing it to you again.
Stores your recent searches for commercial property to rent.
Used to determine the previously selected  members patch preset for the Rightmove Plus dashboard page within our professional users' site, Rightmove Plus.

Stores user active viewports IDs.
Used to store whether the Branch Marketing tour has been dismissed in within our professional users' site, Rightmove Plus to improve page reload times.
Stores user viewport details such as size and dimensions.

Stores a list of up to 20 recently viewed properties to support the user in selecting a property for their mortgage application. This feature is only available if the user consents to functional cookies.
Used to indicate if the member has interacted with the 'whats new' icon within our professional users' site, Rightmove Plus, so we know whether to continue highlighting a new notification.

Stores that you have closed the tooltip explaining how to manually add properties to sent enquiries so that we don't keep showing it to you again.

Stores propertyListingResponse in preview mode for page consumption. It updates during the commercial add/edit flow to let users preview changes. Will be replaced by an IndexedDB in the future.
Stores the dashboard filters selected within Tenancy Manager for members who use our professional users site, Rightmove Plus.

Used to store whether the  Company Level Reports announcement has been dismissed by our members within our professional users' site, Rightmove Plus so we know whether to display it or not in the future.

Used to store the start time of a 60-second countdown during multi-factor authentication (MFA) setup when the user clicks the Resend button. This ensures the countdown continues accurately even if the user reloads the page or screen.

Used to store how many times a Surveyor Comparable Tool announcement has been dismissed by our members within our professional users' site, Rightmove Plus so we know whether to display it or not in the future.
When you complete a tour, it stores a value to show this has been completed so we know whether to show you the tour or not.
Used to determine whether you are shown the option to provide feedback to us.
Stores that you have closed the 'saved properties' tooltip so we don't keep showing it to you again.
Used to store whether the Market Share Reports tour has been dismissed within our professional users' site, Rightmove Plus, to determine whether to show it again or not.
Used to store historic property details when previewing listings within our professional users' platform, Rightmove Plus.
Stores your search parameters when navigating back from the property details page. This allows you to return to the same search results as before.
Stores your brochure enquiry form submission to prevent you from seeing the same form again for the remaining session.
When you click to call about a property, a widget will appear showing you your most recent phone lead enquiries and prompting you as to whether you would like to add these to your sent enquiries.
Used to store the start time of a 10-minute countdown during multi-factor authentication (MFA) setup. This ensures the countdown continues accurately even if the user reloads the page.
Stores details of which properties you wish to hide from your search results. so that they do not appear in your results.
Used to display the relevant market share data for the members patch within our professional users' site, Rightmove Plus.

Used for our commercial property details page, to store whether you have submitted a brochure request form. This helps to prevent you being re-prompted to complete the form again when interacting with the brochure.
Used to remember your saved places within a session.
Stores the reason you provide for hiding a property from your search results.
Stores details of properties you are interested in.
When you click to call about a property, we will continue to show you a banner about whether you wish to add your phone enquiry to your sent enquiries.
Test 2 - session
Used to show the re-onboarding flow in the tray for the one time link flow.
Stores details of properties you are interested in.
Stores the school filters that you select so they are applied whenever you move to any school map view.
Used to display the relevant postcode sectors for the members patch management functionality within our professional users' site, Rightmove Plus.
Used for our commercial property details page, to improve the Browse experience.
Marks that user has logged in through one time link.
When you log in through our one time link, this makes sure that the page landed on then opens up consent in the tray.
Stores your default saved property list so you can add new saved properties to your list.
Stores your last saved property ID to allow you to change the list it's saved in.
Stores details of which properties you wish to hide from your search results. so that they do not appear in your results.
Stores the reason you provide for hiding a property from your search results.
When you use the professional users’ platform, Rightmove Plus, it stores the most recent tab you were on so that this can be open by default on refresh.
Used to store filters in our Market Share Reports within our professional users' site, Rightmove Plus so retains filters when page is refreshed.

Used to store the start time of a 10-minute countdown during multi-factor authentication (MFA) flow when the Email code is sent. This ensures the countdown continues accurately even if the user reloads the page.

Used to store the time of a 60-second countdown during multi-factor authentication (MFA) flow when the user clicks the Resend button to resend the Email code. This ensures the countdown continues accurately even if the user reloads the page or screen.
Saves your search temporarily when you attempt to save a search without being logged in.

When you complete a Mortgage in Principle Application, it stores the request so you have the opportunity to forward your application onto a Broker if you receive a decline on your original application.
When you enter details into a form, it stores and persists your entries when the pages reloads and refreshes so that you do not lose what you have entered.
Stores and persists your Mortgage in Principle application states on page refresh.
